mapper.insert: insert into myboard (board_no, board_title, board_content, board_writer, reg_date) values (seq_board.nextval, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardWriter}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select board_no as boardNo, board_title as boardTitle, board_content as boardContent, board_writer as boardWriter, reg_date as regDate from myboard
select board_no as boardNo, board_title as boardTitle, board_content as boardContent, board_writer as boardWriter, reg_date as regDate from myboard where board_no = #{boardNo}
